_header: The smiling mouth and laughing eyen gray

BLHar682.First Lines:
The smylyng mouth and laughyng eyen grayThe brestis rounde and long
                    smal armys twayne…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…The hondis smoþe þe sidis streiȝt &
                    playneYowre fetis lite what shulde y ferþer say
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
